article_title: News Roundup: Dead Body Found In U-Haul, More
article_text:
Police say a dead body was found inside of a U-Haul truck in the San Francisco Bay Area. Officers claim the truck was being pushed by a man who was involved in a gunfight with transit police. The suspect remains in stable condition at a local hospital, while the officer recovers from his injuries after getting shot in the arm. [NBC Bay Area]

A 54-year-old man killed two women before turning the gun on himself on Christmas Eve in Ashland, Wisconsin. The two women were ages 24 & 84, and their bodies were discovered by a relative. [People]

An earthquake of a 6.3 magnitude hit Afghanistan. News comes just months after a massive quake hit the same mountainous region. Dozens were left injured and many fled their homes in fear of aftershocks. [Daily Mail]

VIDEO/PHOTO CREDIT: Inform, Getty

article_summary:
Police say a dead body was found inside of a U-Haul truck in the San Francisco Bay Area.
[NBC Bay Area]A 54-year-old man killed two women before turning the gun on himself on Christmas Eve in Ashland, Wisconsin.
Officers claim the truck was being pushed by a man who was involved in a gunfight with transit police.
The suspect remains in stable condition at a local hospital, while the officer recovers from his injuries after getting shot in the arm.
The two women were ages 24 & 84, and their bodies were discovered by a relative.
